title: Watch: Will Quad Survive Beyond Nov? Biden's Gesture. PM Modi By His Side
content: US President Joe Biden, one of the architects of the Quad grouping, was asked ahead of the Quad summit in Delaware if it would survive beyond November elections.
summary: US President Joe Biden, one of the architects of the Quad grouping, was asked ahead of the Quad summit in Delaware if it would survive beyond November elections.

title: As PM Modi And Joe Biden Hold Bilateral Talks, A Mega Drone Deal Firms Up
content: India and the United States today firmed up multi-billion dollar drone deal as PM Modi met Joe Biden on the first day of his three-day visit to the US.
summary: India and the United States today firmed up multi-billion dollar drone deal as PM Modi met Joe Biden on the first day of his three-day visit to the US.

title: "Free, Open Indo-Pacific Is Our Shared Priority": PM Modi At Quad Summit
content: A free, open, and inclusive Indo-Pacific is the shared priority and commitment of the Quad countries, said Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the Quad summit on Saturday.
summary: A free, open, and inclusive Indo-Pacific is the shared priority and commitment of the Quad countries, said Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the Quad summit on Saturday.

title: "Talks Were Extreme Fruitful": PM Modi Meets President Biden In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said his talks with US President Joe Biden ahead of the Quad summit were extremely fruitful. The two leaders discussed regional and global issues during their bilateral meeting held at the US President's Delaware home.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said his talks with US President Joe Biden ahead of the Quad summit were extremely fruitful. The two leaders discussed regional and global issues during their bilateral meeting held at the US President's Delaware home.

title: "Each Time We Sit Down...": Biden Posts Pics Of Meeting PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit. PM Modi was welcomed by Mr Biden at his residence, where the two leaders hugged each other. Mr Biden held PM Modi's hand as he led him into the house.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit. PM Modi was welcomed by Mr Biden at his residence, where the two leaders hugged each other. Mr Biden held PM Modi's hand as he led him into the house.

title: Russia-Ukraine Discussion On Agenda As PM Modi, Joe Biden Hold Talks
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit here and the two leaders were expected to discuss a range of issues, including the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday met US President Joe Biden on the margins of the Quad summit here and the two leaders were expected to discuss a range of issues, including the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: French President Macron Announces New Government Led By PM Michel Barnier
content: President Emmanuel Macron named a new government led by Prime Minister Michel Barnier Saturday, his office said, marked by a shift to the right 11 weeks after an inconclusive parliamentary election.
summary: President Emmanuel Macron named a new government led by Prime Minister Michel Barnier Saturday, his office said, marked by a shift to the right 11 weeks after an inconclusive parliamentary election.

title: New Zealand Pilot Freed After 19 Months In Rebel Captivity In Indonesia
content: New Zealand pilot Phillip Mehrtens has been released from captivity by rebels in Indonesia's restive Papua region and is in good health despite the 19-month ordeal, Indonesian and New Zealand authorities said Saturday.
summary: New Zealand pilot Phillip Mehrtens has been released from captivity by rebels in Indonesia's restive Papua region and is in good health despite the 19-month ordeal, Indonesian and New Zealand authorities said Saturday.

title: Kamala Harris Challenges Donald Trump To Another Debate Ahead Of Elections
content: Kamala Harris on Saturday challenged Donald Trump to another debate in the lead-up to the US presidential election, with her campaign saying she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to host the event on October 23.
summary: Kamala Harris on Saturday challenged Donald Trump to another debate in the lead-up to the US presidential election, with her campaign saying she had accepted an invitation from broadcaster CNN to host the event on October 23.

title: From A Virtual Meeting In 2021 To Delaware - A Timeline Of Quad Summits
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Philadelphia Saturday to begin his three-day US trip with the Quad Leaders' Summit being held in Wilmington, Delaware.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Philadelphia Saturday to begin his three-day US trip with the Quad Leaders' Summit being held in Wilmington, Delaware.

title: Heat Stress: New Research Shows Lower Threshold, Urgent Need For Action
content: New research shows that the human body's ability to tolerate heat and humidity is lower than previously thought, with a critical wet-bulb temperature threshold closer to 31 degrees Celsius.
summary: New research shows that the human body's ability to tolerate heat and humidity is lower than previously thought, with a critical wet-bulb temperature threshold closer to 31 degrees Celsius.

title: "Indian Community Making Positive Impact Across Sectors": PM Modi In US
content: Praising the Indian community and their achievements in the United States, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that the community has distinguished itself in the USA, making a positive impact across diverse sectors.
summary: Praising the Indian community and their achievements in the United States, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that the community has distinguished itself in the USA, making a positive impact across diverse sectors.

title: Baby Brains Recognise Eye Contact From Robots Too, New Study Finds
content: The study, published in Biological Psychology, highlights the growing importance of understanding how infants interact with technology and the potential impact of robots on early social development.
summary: The study, published in Biological Psychology, highlights the growing importance of understanding how infants interact with technology and the potential impact of robots on early social development.

title: Watch: Indian Community's Big Welcome For PM Modi As He Lands In US
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived to an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived to an enthusiastic welcome in Philadelphia as he kicked off his three-day visit to the United States, on Saturday.

title: India's 1st Cancer Genome Atlas Launched Ahead Of Quad's 'Cancer Moonshot' Initiative
content: A high profile global initiative to tackle cancer called the 'Cancer MoonShot' will be announced on the sidelines of the Quad Summit.
summary: A high profile global initiative to tackle cancer called the 'Cancer MoonShot' will be announced on the sidelines of the Quad Summit.

title: PM Modi, Joe Biden Hold India-US Bilateral Talks, Quad Leaders' Meet Next
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, who arrived in the United States earlier today for his three-day official visit, is currently holding bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden. They will then attend the strategic Quad summit later today.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, who arrived in the United States earlier today for his three-day official visit, is currently holding bilateral talks with US President Joe Biden. They will then attend the strategic Quad summit later today.

title: When PM Told Obama - 'Your Limousine Is As Big As My Mother's House'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi told Barack Obama in 2014 that the size of the then-US president's car was almost as big as the house his mother lived in.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi told Barack Obama in 2014 that the size of the then-US president's car was almost as big as the house his mother lived in.

title: 37 Killed In Israeli Air Strike On Beirut, Says Lebanon
content: The death count from an Israeli air strike targeting Hezbollah military commanders in Beirut's southern suburbs has risen to 37 dead, Lebanon's health ministry said on Saturday.
summary: The death count from an Israeli air strike targeting Hezbollah military commanders in Beirut's southern suburbs has risen to 37 dead, Lebanon's health ministry said on Saturday.

title: LIVE: Quad Summit Under Way, PM Modi Meets Leaders From US, Japan, Australia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and leaders from US, Japan and Australia met at the Quad leaders' summit in Wilmington, Delaware today hours after PM Modi arrived in Philadelphia for his three-day US Visit.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and leaders from US, Japan and Australia met at the Quad leaders' summit in Wilmington, Delaware today hours after PM Modi arrived in Philadelphia for his three-day US Visit.

title: "Kids Were Playing...": Israeli Strike Kills 22 In Gaza, Say Palestinians
content: Palestinians said an Israeli strike killed at least 22 people in a school sheltering displaced people in southern Gaza City on Saturday, while the Israeli military said the attack targeted a command centre of Hamas.
summary: Palestinians said an Israeli strike killed at least 22 people in a school sheltering displaced people in southern Gaza City on Saturday, while the Israeli military said the attack targeted a command centre of Hamas.
